tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Wisdom Tooth Extraction,Post and Core,Zirconia Crowns,
review: I went for a wisdom teeth (last upper Molar) extraction which was in a real bad shape the pain was so excruciating for a week but then I visited Dr Prachi and her medicinal course was on point gave me relief in a quick 3 days and then I went for the extraction it was a smooth 5 minute affair without the pain I was expecting. Then she started the RCT process in one of my other tooth. The procedure was all explained thoroughly beforehand and I prepared my schedule and mind for the post and core process. Just like before the whole process was executed precisely just the way she explained to me. I would strongly recommend her to anyone for her excellent work and follow up reminders taken care of by the clinic staff and Dr herself.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor and team is friendly. They listened to me patiently and cleared all my myths. I got a beautiful smile with white fillings. All holes in my teeth are gone now. Thank u. I recommend this clinic. Small but has advanced facilities

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: So, this wasn't the first time I opted for scaling but this time I visited Dr. Prachi Kohli. To be frank my experience with Dr. Prachi was excellent. Being an experienced dentist she first explained the whole procedure and assured me about the results. The results were exact as she promised. I would surely visit her again and recommend her to every person looking for a good dentist.
